# [Interview #1148: Shadows of Self-Denver, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1148#2)

#### Kayla

Is it possible to use a Steelpush while wearing Shardplate?

#### Brandon Sanderson

After some confusion re: not Pushing on the Plate, but something else: yes. And weâ€¦ think the mass of the plate would be what determined the force needed, not its (much lighter) effective weight to the bearer.
